title: How to Make Banana Bread (Breakfast Type)

steps.headline: Grease all the inside surfaces of the pan
Sprinkle a small amount of flour into the pan, and then shake the flour around until all sides of the pan are covered with flour.
steps.description: This will ensure the bread will come out of the pan smoothly

steps.headline: Mash the bananas.
steps.description: Mixing them in with the other ingredients is easier if they’re already mashed

steps.headline: Combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda in a medium-sized bowl
Add shortening or softened butter to the flour mixture; mix until the mixture looks like crumbs
Add both eggs and stir them in
Add the mashed bananas and mix thoroughly, until batter is mostly smooth (some lumps are fine)
Pour the batter into the greased and floured pan
Place the pan into the oven and bake at 350° for about 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean

text: Preheat the oven to 350°  Grease all the inside surfaces of the pan  Sprinkle a small amount of flour into the pan, and then shake the flour around until all sides of the pan are covered with flour. This will ensure the bread will come out of the pan smoothly Mash the bananas. Mixing them in with the other ingredients is easier if they’re already mashed Combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda in a medium-sized bowl  Add shortening or softened butter to the flour mixture; mix until the mixture looks like crumbs  Add both eggs and stir them in  Add the mashed bananas and mix thoroughly, until batter is mostly smooth (some lumps are fine)  Pour the batter into the greased and floured pan  Place the pan into the oven and bake at 350° for about 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean
